ack.title: Authors’ contributions
ack.p: C-JW, J-ZW, Z-XZ and G-MZ contributed to modelling, editing and drafting the manuscript. C-JW and J-ZW performed all data and econometric analysis and contributed to modelling and drafting the manuscript. G-MZ improved the quality of our manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: This research was supported by the Fundamental Research Funds for the Central Universities (BLYJ201606), the National Natural Science Foundation of China (31270253) and the entrusted project of protection division under State Forestry Bureau “The gap analysis and establishment of regulatory database for three important endangered plant species”. We thank the following National Nature Reserves for the use of their species data: Banqiao, Gujingyuan, Qingliangfeng, Songshan, Daiyunshan, E’meifeng, Longqishan, Minjianghekoushidi, Minjiangyuan, sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
